DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the normal reference values of pulse oximetry plethymographic waveform parameters in Chinese population.
DOC.brief_title: The Normal Reference Values of Pulse Oximetry Plethymographic Waveform Parameters
DOC.criteria: Healty adults; Comply with ethical requirements and signed informed consent. Leuconychia; Stained fingernails; Diseases that have an impact on the blood flow of the peripheral tissue (such as Raynaud's phenomenon, vasculitis and so on); Any conditions the study physicians believe not suitable for inclusion.
